annotations.description: Unique message identifier inside this chat. In specific instances (e.g., message containing a video sent to a big chat), the server might automatically schedule a message instead of sending it immediately. In such cases, this field will be 0 and the relevant message will be unusable until it is actually sent
annotations.html_description: Unique message identifier inside this chat. In specific instances (e.g., message containing a video sent to a big chat), the server might automatically schedule a message instead of sending it immediately. In such cases, this field will be 0 and the relevant message will be unusable until it is actually sent
annotations.rst_description: Unique message identifier inside this chat. In specific instances (e.g., message containing a video sent to a big chat), the server might automatically schedule a message instead of sending it immediately. In such cases, this field will be 0 and the relevant message will be unusable until it is actually sent
annotations.name: message_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of a message thread to which the message belongs; for supergroups only
annotations.html_description: Optional. Unique identifier of a message thread to which the message belongs; for supergroups only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Unique identifier of a message thread to which the message belongs; for supergroups only
annotations.name: message_thread_id

annotations.description: Sender of the message; may be empty for messages sent to channels. For backward compatibility, if the message was sent on behalf of a chat, the field contains a fake sender user in non-channel chats
annotations.html_description: Optional. Sender of the message; may be empty for messages sent to channels. For backward compatibility, if the message was sent on behalf of a chat, the field contains a fake sender user in non-channel chats
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Sender of the message; may be empty for messages sent to channels. For backward compatibility, if the message was sent on behalf of a chat, the field contains a fake sender user in non-channel chats
annotations.name: from

annotations.description: Sender of the message when sent on behalf of a chat. For example, the supergroup itself for messages sent by its anonymous administrators or a linked channel for messages automatically forwarded to the channel's discussion group. For backward compatibility, if the message was sent on behalf of a chat, the field from contains a fake sender user in non-channel chats.
annotations.html_description: Optional. Sender of the message when sent on behalf of a chat. For example, the supergroup itself for messages sent by its anonymous administrators or a linked channel for messages automatically forwarded to the channel's discussion group. For backward compatibility, if the message was sent on behalf of a chat, the field from contains a fake sender user in non-channel chats.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Sender of the message when sent on behalf of a chat. For example, the supergroup itself for messages sent by its anonymous administrators or a linked channel for messages automatically forwarded to the channel's discussion group. For backward compatibility, if the message was sent on behalf of a chat, the field *from* contains a fake sender user in non-channel chats.
annotations.name: sender_chat

annotations.description: If the sender of the message boosted the chat, the number of boosts added by the user
annotations.html_description: Optional. If the sender of the message boosted the chat, the number of boosts added by the user
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. If the sender of the message boosted the chat, the number of boosts added by the user
annotations.name: sender_boost_count

annotations.description: Service message: the supergroup has been created. It can only be found in reply_to_message if someone replies to a very first message in a directly created supergroup.

This field can't be received in a message coming through updates, because bot can't be a member of a supergroup when it is created. annotations.name: supergroup_chat_created

annotations.description: Service message: the channel has been created. This field can't be received in a message coming through updates, because bot can't be a member of a channel when it is created. It can only be found in reply_to_message if someone replies to a very first message in a channel.

annotations.description: The group has been migrated to a supergroup with the specified identifier. This number may have more than 32 significant bits and some programming languages may have difficulty/silent defects in interpreting it. But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.

But it has at most 52 significant bits, so a signed 64-bit integer or double-precision float type are safe for storing this identifier.

annotations.html_description: Optional. Inline keyboard attached to the message. login_url buttons are represented as ordinary url buttons.
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Inline keyboard attached to the message. :code:`login_url` buttons are represented as ordinary :code:`url` buttons.
annotations.name: reply_markup

annotations.description: For forwarded messages, date the original message was sent in Unix time
annotations.html_description: Optional. For forwarded messages, date the original message was sent in Unix time
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For forwarded messages, date the original message was sent in Unix time
annotations.name: forward_date

annotations.description: For forwarded messages, sender of the original message
annotations.html_description: Optional. For forwarded messages, sender of the original message
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For forwarded messages, sender of the original message
annotations.name: forward_from

annotations.description: For messages forwarded from channels or from anonymous administrators, information about the original sender chat
annotations.html_description: Optional. For messages forwarded from channels or from anonymous administrators, information about the original sender chat
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For messages forwarded from channels or from anonymous administrators, information about the original sender chat
annotations.name: forward_from_chat

annotations.description: For messages forwarded from channels, identifier of the original message in the channel
annotations.html_description: Optional. For messages forwarded from channels, identifier of the original message in the channel
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For messages forwarded from channels, identifier of the original message in the channel
annotations.name: forward_from_message_id

annotations.description: Sender's name for messages forwarded from users who disallow adding a link to their account in forwarded messages
annotations.html_description: Optional. Sender's name for messages forwarded from users who disallow adding a link to their account in forwarded messages
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Sender's name for messages forwarded from users who disallow adding a link to their account in forwarded messages
annotations.name: forward_sender_name

annotations.description: For forwarded messages that were originally sent in channels or by an anonymous chat administrator, signature of the message sender if present
annotations.html_description: Optional. For forwarded messages that were originally sent in channels or by an anonymous chat administrator, signature of the message sender if present
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. For forwarded messages that were originally sent in channels or by an anonymous chat administrator, signature of the message sender if present
annotations.name: forward_signature

annotations.description: Service message: a user was shared with the bot
annotations.html_description: Optional. Service message: a user was shared with the bot
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Service message: a user was shared with the bot
annotations.name: user_shared
